title: A bill to provide emergency assistance for families receiving assistance under part A of title IV of the Social Security Act and low-income working families.
content: Low-Income Gasoline Assistance Program Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to enable States to establish emergency assistance programs to make certain payments to eligible households for the purchase of gasoline. Amends part A (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act to authorize a State to use funds from any grant made to the State under the TANF program for a fiscal year to carry out such a State low-income gasoline assistance program pursuant to this Act.
